rules.ruleString: Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ECC4650}
Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 09, 09-1, 09-4}

description: Principles and techniques used in the economic evaluation of health services. Topics include effectiveness, efficiency and economic evaluation; cost benefit analysis; cost effectiveness and cost utility analysis; multi-attribute utility analysis; measuring utility; psychometric measurement theory; ethical issues in resource allocation; decision criteria; time discounting; costing.
